SELECT bob.bob_id AS bob_id, title, content, background_image, trim(category_code) AS category_code, users.profile_image AS profile_image, writer_id, users.name AS user_name, trim(bob.status) AS status
,limit_num, bob.location_name AS location_name, bob.longitude AS longitude, bob.latitude AS latitude, to_char(bob.time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS time
FROM BOB, USERS , PARTICIPANT
bob.writer_id = users.user_id AND bob.status NOT IN ('N')
AND trim(category_code) = #{category}
AND bob.bob_id = participant.bob_id AND participant.user_id = #{searchKeyword}
AND trim(category_code) IN ('B01', 'B02')
ORDER BY bob.time NULLS LAST
